## bac
细菌的表目前在/share/home/jianglab/shared/ouxinyi2liuzhen/bacteria23/bac23_random_bitscore_add_uniq_info，16G太大了，要想办法处理

```{bash}
#常用分析的几列
cat bac23_random_bitscore_add_uniq_info|cut -f1-7,22-25,28 > pc/bac23_net

#8.14还有13G，24,474,900条记录，一共level4的spacer好像才25,000,000左右，应该有不少重复的？
$ wc -l bac23_net
24474900 bac23_net

#8.21检查后还有11G, 19,022,419条记录,占75%左右

#目前大多分析只需要看lca后的物种关系，所以可以sort｜uniq ，发现这里的已经是uniq后的了
#所以说，细菌就是绝大部分的spacer都可以被blast到结果？
#那目前数据太大了，考虑各种计算都分块进行再整合

#同一物种内 互相target的不同strain 是否针对 “对方有 我没有”这个原则来设计spacer
#这个要做的话应该要考虑lca前的
```

假设将bacteria分成19份，都不带表头，bac_net_1-19
```{bash}
split -l 1000000 bac23_net bac_net

count=1
for file in bac_net[a-z]*; do
    new_name="bac_net_$count"
    mv "$file" "$new_name"
    ((count++))
done

sed -i '1d' bac_net_1
```

spacer_id
unique_spacer_id

```{r}
library(iCRISPR)
library(dplyr)
#读取（集群
for (i in 1:19) {
  bac_net<-readr::read_delim(paste0("bac_net_",i),delim = "\t",col_names = c("spacer_id", "unique_spacer_id", "target_taxid", "target_lineage", "target_kingdom", "source_genome", "CRISPR_id", "spacer_taxid", "spacer_lineage", "spacer_kingdom", "target_genome", "gene_or_not"))
  #bac_net=bac_net[,c(5,6,1,4,2,3,10,9,7,8)]
  bac_net=bac_net[,c("source_genome","CRISPR_id","spacer_id","unique_spacer_id",
            "spacer_kingdom","spacer_taxid","spacer_lineage","target_genome",
            "target_kingdom","target_taxid","target_lineage","gene_or_not")]
  bac_net=na.omit(bac_net)
  colnames(bac_net)=c("source_genome","CRISPR_id","Spacer_id","unique_spacer_id",
            "source_kingdom","source_taxid","source_lineage","target_genome",
            "target_kingdom","target_taxid","target_lineage","gene_or_not")
  bac_net$source_lineage%>%stringr::str_extract(.,"s__.*")->bac_net$source_name
  bac_net$target_lineage%>%stringr::str_extract(.,"s__.*")->bac_net$target_name
  saveRDS(bac_net,file = paste0("bac_net_",i,".RDS"))
}
```

target kingdom的分布

target species的target_gene_ratio与本身的gene ratio
```{r}
arc_target_genome_ratio=distinct(crisprdb_arc$target_info[,c("target_lineage","target_genome_gene_ratio")])%>%
  group_by(target_lineage)%>%
  summarise(target_genome_gene_ratio=mean(target_genome_gene_ratio))

arc_target_genome_ratio$target_lineage%>%stringr::str_extract(.,"s__.*")->arc_target_genome_ratio$target_name

#明确target_name的主体
#
#1.把target到同一个genome的spacer加起来
arc_count_tar=group_by(arc_count,target_name)%>%
  summarise(spacer_n=sum(spacer_n),gene=sum(gene))%>%mutate(gene_ratio=gene/spacer_n)

tmp=left_join(arc_count_tar,arc_target_genome_ratio)%>%filter(spacer_n>5)
my_lm(tmp["gene_ratio"],"target_genome_gene_ratio",tmp)

#2.只看self-target
tmp=left_join(arc_count%>%filter(phy_dis==0),arc_target_genome_ratio)%>%filter(spacer_n>5)
my_lm(tmp["gene_ratio"],"target_genome_gene_ratio",tmp)

#用genome本身的gene_ratio进行矫正
arc_count2=left_join(arc_count,arc_target_genome_ratio)

tmp=distinct_all(arc_count2[,c("target_Kingdom","target_name","target_genome_gene_ratio")])

tmp$target_Kingdom=gsub("k__","",tmp$target_Kingdom)
group_box(tmp["target_genome_gene_ratio"],"target_Kingdom",tmp)+mytheme+
  scale_color_manual(values = crispr_target_domain)+labs(title = "Archaea")

ggsave("2.Blast_res/2.arc_target_genome_gene_ratio_each_kingdom.pdf",height = 5)

arc_count2=arc_count2%>%mutate(gene_ratio=gene_ratio/target_genome_gene_ratio)
gene_pd_lm(arc_count2,mode = 2,filter_spacer = 5)+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0,2.5,0.2))+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 1,linetype=2)+labs(y = "adjusted coding proportion")

ggsave(filename = "2.Blast_res/2.arc_adj_gene_ratio_phy_dis.pdf",width = 5.6,height = 5)
```

# spacerome of each species

```{bash}
#unique spacer 也很重要，代表每个物种的crisprome diversity，代表某种进化保守性，所以也要走流程看看
```

## NR2GO

GO富集，先把spacer比对到NR库，然后可以找到NR对应的GO关系，用这个做富集。
```{r}
load_all("../../ReporterScore/")
GO_res=list("RefSeq"=list("gene"=NULL,"inter"=NULL),"GeneID"=list("gene"=NULL,"inter"=NULL))

#intergene富集结果#gene富集结果
#gng=c("gene","inter")[1];mode=c("RefSeq","GeneID")[1]

for (mode in c("RefSeq","GeneID")) {
  for (gng in c("gene","inter")){
    
gene_res=read.table(paste0("2.Blast_res/bac_bac_nr_",gng,"_go_uniq_spacer2"),sep = "\t",header = T)
gene_res=gene_res[,c("unique_spacer_id","spacer_counts",mode,"GO")]

#GO-RefSeq或GeneID的关系
gene_res=explode(gene_res,3,"; ")
gene_res2=distinct_(gene_res,"unique_spacer_id",mode,.keep_all = T)

background=gene_res[,3:4]%>%distinct_all()
background=explode(background,2,"; ")

load_GOinfo()
GOmodulelist=custom_modulelist(background[,2:1],GOinfo[,1:2])

#spacer_count
gene_count=gene_res2%>%group_by_(mode)%>%summarise(spacer_counts=sum(spacer_counts))%>%
  arrange(-spacer_counts)%>%as.data.frame()
colnames(gene_count)[1]=mode
#hist(gene_count$spacer_counts)

#取spacer_number前5%的做前景富集
top=ceiling(nrow(gene_count)*0.05)

#构造一个假的p值
ko_stat=rbind(
  data.frame(KO_id=gene_count[1:top,mode],p.adjust=0.04),
  data.frame(KO_id=gene_count[top+1:nrow(gene_count),mode],p.adjust=0.1)
  )

spacer_enrich=KO_fisher(ko_stat,modulelist = GOmodulelist,p.adjust.method = "none")
GO_res[[mode]][[gng]]=spacer_enrich
  }
}

View(GO_res$RefSeq$gene)
View(GO_res$GeneID$gene)

plot_enrich_res(GO_res$RefSeq,padj_threshold = 0.05,mode = 2,facet_level = T,facet_anno = GOinfo[,c(3,1)])
ggsave(filename = "2.Blast_res/5.gene_inter_anno_go_RefSeq.pdf")
plot_enrich_res(GO_res$GeneID,padj_threshold = 0.05,mode = 2,facet_level = T,facet_anno = GOinfo[,c(3,1)])
ggsave(filename = "2.Blast_res/5.gene_inter_anno_go_GeneID.pdf")

```
